DRBY 2008-02-27T12:00:00 Derby (DRBY) Magnetometer Station is located in Derby, Vermont, USA. This station has an Educational Public Outreach magnetometer operated by UCLA. EPO magnetometers should be used carefully, as they may be subject to environmental noise. Magnetic Latitude: 54.53 Magnetic Longitude: 366.39 UT of Magnetic Midnight: 4.6333 Magnetic Declination: -15.50 Magnetic coordinates obtained by calculation using the CCGM online program with IGRF 2008 at altitude of 0 km.
